akn:section.akn:heading: No separate taxable entities for partnerships, corporations, etc.

akn:content.akn:p: § 1399. No separate taxable entities for partnerships, corporations, etc. Except in any case to which section 1398 applies, no separate taxable entity shall result from the commencement of a case under title 11 of the United States Code. (Added Pub. L. 96–589, § 3(a)(1), Dec. 24, 1980, 94 Stat. 3400.)
